title: True Lies
creator_credit: Lightstorm Entertainment, 20th Century Fox, James Cameron, Peter Lamont, Marlene Stewart, Stephanie Austin, Claude Zidi, Simon Michaël and Didier Kaminka
brief_description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.
